attributes.action: refund one hundred percent of orphan assets now renamed  inherited estate to with profit policyholders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The orphan asset/inherited estate belongs to the with profit endownment and pension policyholders. Contracts were sold when the company was a mutual company.  
Policyholders invested into stocks and shares which have increased overall since the 1940's. The company would take a lump sum each year from the investments when there was a peak and place it in an additional fund called orphan assets to cover any troughs, thus ensuring endownment mortgages always met their target but usually had a surplus.
For policyholders to be told there is a shortfall on their mortgage whilst at the same time the fund to smooth peaks and troughs is distributed to the company and shareholders with a small sum to policyholders renamed a 'windfall', is unethical.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
